mapper.select: SELECT REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_CONTENT, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM (SELECT SEQ, REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_CONTENT, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_CONTENT, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM (SELECT REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_CONTENT, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_TOWN_INFO) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT T.REC_T_ID, T.REC_T_IMG_ID, T.TOWN_ID, T.POST_TYPE_ID, T.REC_T_TITLE, T.REC_T_CONTENT, T.REC_T_DATE_CREATED, T.REC_T_VIEW_CNT, T.REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, T.REC_T_SITE, T.REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_TOWN_INFO T INNER JOIN REC_TOWN_IMAGES I ON T.REC_T_IMG_ID = I.REC_TOWN_IMG_ID WHERE REC_T_ID=#{recTId}

SELECT REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM(SELECT REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_TOWN_INFO WHERE REC_T_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchDTO.keyword}||'%' UNION SELECT REC_T_ID, REC_T_IMG_ID, TOWN_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, REC_T_TITLE, REC_T_DATE_CREATED, REC_T_VIEW_CNT, REC_T_FAVORITE_CNT, REC_T_SITE, REC_T_THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM REC_TOWN_INFO WHERE TOWN_ID=#{searchDTO.postType} ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startPostNo} AND #{endPostNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REC_TOWN_INFO VALUES (REC_TOWN_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recTImgId}, #{townId}, #{postTypeId}, #{recTTitle}, #{recTContent}, TO_DATE(#{recTDateCreated},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{recTViewCnt}, #{recTFavoriteCnt}, #{recTSite}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE REC_TOWN_INFO SET REC_T_IMG_ID = #{recTImgId} WHERE REC_T_ID = #{recTId}
